author: @WNEMTV5news
title: Northern lights possible tonight, not as cold, 70s on Friday
text: Northern lights possible tonight, not as cold, 70s on Friday SAGINAW, Mich. (WNEM) - It‚Äôs been another beautiful day around Mid-Michigan with plenty of sunshine and pleasant October temperatures. We‚Äôll be watching the dry conditions tomorrow that have slightly overshadowed our beautiful weather lately, with Fire Weather Watches in place on Friday. Our winds will pick up, which will make burning dangerous. You can find more info on those watches on our [Weather Alerts page](//wnem.com/weather/alerts). We also had some areas added to the [Drought Monitor](https://www.wnem.com/2024/10/10/fire-weather-watch-friday-parts-mid-michigan-now-drought-stage/). This Evening & Overnight We expect a beautiful evening tonight, with mostly clear skies around the area. Temperatures in the 50s and 60s this afternoon once again are expected to drop off into the 40s, but not much further than that tonight. A southwesterly wind should keep us a bit warmer than the last few nights. All signs seem to be pointing to a good shot at seeing the northern lights tonight, so dress warm and get somewhere dark and look north if you plan on being up late tonight. We will of course let you know when we start getting sightings around the area, but you may be able to see them without waiting up too late tonight. Going out right when it gets dark tonight may even provide a chance. As always, space weather is never a guarantee. But so far, things look good as we move into tonight. We‚Äôll do our best to keep you updated. Friday Friday we expect increasing clouds over the area and there may be a little wildfire smoke overhead, but beyond that, there should still be some sunshine poking through. Southwesterly winds will be breezy around 10 to 20 miles per hour with gusts near 25 to 30 miles per hour. Those winds will bring increased fire danger, so Red Flag Warnings will likely replace the Fire Weather Watches on Friday. Highs will benefit from those southwesterly winds, with 70s expected on Friday as we wrap up the workweek. We‚Äôll be well above average on Friday, with a beautiful finish to the workweek. A cold front sweeping through the area may bring a slight chance for a light shower or sprinkle on Friday evening, but right now we don‚Äôt expect that to be a widespread chance. The front doesn‚Äôt have a ton of moisture to work with, so anything that develops will be fighting an uphill battle. As always, we‚Äôll monitor conditions tomorrow morning and see if we need to up that chance. Copyright 2024 WNEM. All rights reserved.

author: Juan Carlos Navarro Garc√≠a
title: Las creencias que te est√°n haciendo infeliz en pareja y con tus hijos
text:
Tu vida familiar y de pareja y la felicidad que se deriva de ella est√° condicionada en gran medida por las ideas que albergas sobre c√≥mo deben ser las cosas en este entorno. Si tu sistema de creencias es equilibrado y sereno, es muy probable que tu vida familiar sea placentera y la vida con los tuyos sea fuente de satisfacci√≥n permanente.
Sin embargo un conjunto de creencias en el que asignamos a otros obligaciones que no tienen, probablemente terminar√° por arruinar tu
[felicidad](/bienestar/el-poder-del-abrazo-el-secreto-cientifico-para-alimentar-la-felicidad-en-tu-vida-s4073822.html) en el √°mbito de las relaciones familiares. Por eso es importante que te asegures de que tus ideas respecto a la pareja y los hijos no son err√≥neas. Para comprobar que as√≠ es, te mostramos varias creencias que pueden perjudicar en gran medida tu relaci√≥n con los que m√°s quieres.
Tu pareja tiene que esforzarse para hacerte feliz
Si eres de las que piensa que hacerte feliz es una obligaci√≥n de tu pareja est√°s poniendo una carga injusta y pesada sobre sus hombros. La pareja es alguien con quien se comparte la felicidad, pero √©sta debes buscarla por tu cuenta. Por lo tanto, ocupa m√°s tiempo en conocerte a ti misma para poder encontrarla y menos en exigirle algo que no est√° en su mano ofrecerte.
Tu pareja deber√≠a saber lo que sientes
Por muy intensa que sea la conexi√≥n que os une, es imposible que nadie sepa tus sentimientos si no los expresas de alg√∫n modo. Que creas que alguien, por quererte, ya debe tener esa capacidad de conocer tus emociones en cada momento es un grave error. Pero mayor a√∫n lo es creer que, si no es capaz de saber lo que sientes, es porque no te ama. Todas estas asunciones solo llevan a crear un resentimiento que, adem√°s, es injustificado.
Deber√≠a haber pasi√≥n en tu relaci√≥n
No es que esta creencia sea err√≥nea, es que cada relaci√≥n y cada persona son distintas. Adem√°s la vida se compone de muchas etapas, y la pasi√≥n no es una de las que dure para siempre. Al principio es normal y l√≥gico que el amor se viva con un apasionamiento que nos absorbe, pero seg√∫n pasa el tiempo, esta sensaci√≥n se va apaciguando. No olvides que en gran medida el amor apasionado es una tormenta de hormonas en acci√≥n, pero el amor verdadero tiene otras caracter√≠sticas y no por ello es menos aut√©ntico.
Las tareas deben repartirse a partes iguales
La educaci√≥n de los hijos y las tareas del hogar son cosa de dos, pero nadie dice que ambos tengan que estar implicados en la misma medida. Primero, porque depende del tiempo del que cada uno disponga, y segundo, porque lo ideal es que cada uno se encargue de hacer aquello que se le da mejor.
LETTER
Tenemos que educar a nuestros hijos como nos educaron a nosotros
Que tus padres te educaran con unos valores no implica que t√∫ debas transmitir los mismos a tus hijos. Los tiempos cambian, y el padre de tus hijos puede tener ideas y creencias distintas a aquellas con las que t√∫ creciste. Lo adecuado es llegar a un acuerdo y que se√°is vosotros los que decid√°is como quer√©is que vuestros hijos se eduquen, haci√©ndolo de un modo consciente y deliberado, no por mera repetici√≥n de patrones aprendidos.

author: Europa Press
title: Trinidad y Tobago reconoce al Estado de Palestina como forma de fortalecer "el consenso internacional"
text:
Puerto Espa√±a se une as√≠ a Barbados y Jamaica en sus recientes pasos para lograr una "soluci√≥n de dos Estados"
MADRID, 3 May. (EUROPA PRESS) -
El Gobierno de Trinidad y Tobago ha anunciado este jueves el reconocimiento del Estado de Palestina como v√≠a para intentar alcanzar una "paz duradera" en la regi√≥n y para fortalecer "el consenso internacional" respecto a la resoluci√≥n del conflicto palestino-israel√≠.
"El gabinete ha determinado que el reconocimiento formal de Palestina por parte de la Rep√∫blica de Trinidad y Tobago contribuir√° al logro de una paz duradera al fortalecer el creciente consenso internacional sobre la cuesti√≥n de la condici√≥n de Estado de Palestina", reza un comunicado del Ministerio de Exteriores del pa√≠s.
As√≠, ha resaltado su "larga historia" apoyando el derecho del pueblo palestino a la autodeterminaci√≥n, y ha expresado que la soluci√≥n de dos Estados es la √∫nica que puede acabar con el actual ciclo de violencia.
"Apoyamos la soluci√≥n de dos Estados, en la que la paz y el desarrollo sostenible puedan llegar a los pueblos de Oriente Pr√≥ximo, Israel y sus vecinos, reconociendo el derecho de Israel a existir y tambi√©n el derecho de los palestinos a un Estado propio. Esa es la posici√≥n de Trinidad y Tobago, esa era nuestra posici√≥n. Esa es nuestra posici√≥n, con guerra o sin guerra", ha asegurado el primer ministro trinitense, Keith Rowley.
Puerto Espa√±a tambi√©n ha recordado que, de la misma forma, apoya el estatus de Palestina para ser considerado como miembro con plenos derechos del organismo, as√≠ como las diferentes resoluciones de la ONU respecto a la desocupaci√≥n de los territorios palestinos, incluidos Jerusal√©n Este, y los Altos del Gol√°n, arrebatados a Siria durante la Guerra de los Seis D√≠as (1967) y la Guerra del Yom Kipur (1973).
As√≠, Trinidad y Tobago se convierte en el 141 Estado miembro de la ONU en reconocer al Estado de Palestina, tan solo unos d√≠as despu√©s de que Jamaica y Barbados hicieran lo propio. Previamente, el √∫ltimo pa√≠s en reconocer a Palestina como un Estado fue San Crist√≥bal y Nieves, en julio de 2019.
Leer m√°s acerca de: Israel Palestina

author: world today news
title: The Future of Human Robots: From Earth to Space with NASA's Valkyrie and Apptronik's Apollo - World Today News
text: JAKARTA ‚Äì NASA‚Äôs Valkyrie human robot, 6 feet 2 inches (188 centimeters) tall and weighing 300 pounds (136 kilograms), is an impressive figure. The Valkyrie, named after a female figure in Norse mythology and being tested at the Johnson Space Center in Houston, Texas, is designed to operate in ‚Äúdamaged or degraded man-made environments,‚Äù such as areas affected by natural disasters. However, such robots could also one day operate in outer space. A humanoid robot resembles a human, generally with a body, head, two arms, and two legs. Engineers believe that with the right software, human robots will eventually be able to function similarly to humans and use the same tools and equipment. NASA‚Äôs Skilled Robotics Team Leader, Shaun Azimi, said that human robots in space could eventually handle risky tasks such as cleaning solar panels or checking problematic equipment outside spacecraft so astronauts can prioritize exploration and discovery. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not trying to replace human crew, we‚Äôre really just trying to take the boring, dirty and dangerous work out of their jobs to allow them to focus on higher level activities,‚Äù Azimi said. NASA is working with robotics companies like Austin, Texas-based Apptronik to understand how human robots developed for purposes on Earth could benefit future human robots destined for space. Apptronik developed Apollo, a humanoid robot whose duties on Earth included working in warehouses and manufacturing plants moving packages, stacking pallets and other supply chain related tasks. The company plans to start providing these human robots to companies in early 2025. Apptronik CTO Nick Paine said that Apollo has clear advantages over its human counterpart, especially durability. Read more: Unveiling the Shockingly Affordable B760 DDR5 Motherboard: A Game-Changer for Budget PC Builders ‚ÄúWe aim to have this system online for 22 hours a day,‚Äù Paine said. ‚ÄúIt has interchangeable batteries, so you can work for four hours, swap batteries, and then continue for a very short duration,‚Äù he added. Apptronik CEO Jeff Cardenas said the sky is the limit as software and development advances enhance Apollo‚Äôs capabilities. ‚ÄúThe approach is that we start in the warehouse and on the factory floor, but then can move into retail‚Ä¶ to shipping and more into what we call the structureless space,‚Äù Cardenas said. According to Azimi, in the coming years, this structureless space could include outer space. ‚ÄúRobots like Apollo are designed with modularity in mind to be able to adapt to many applications,‚Äù Azimi said. ‚ÄúAnd that‚Äôs where NASA is really trying to get those insights ‚Äì to see what the key gaps are, where we need to invest in the future to get systems on Earth into the space environment and certified to operate there.‚Äù Tag: space nasa valkyrie robot 2023-12-28 21:05:00 #Valkyrie #NASAs #Human #Robot #Operating #Risky #Tasks #Space

author: Monique Faria
title: Novo recurso do Instagram bloquear√° capturas de telas para combater a sextors√£o
text: Medida refor√ßa luta contra a chantagem e amea√ßa de divulga√ß√£o de imagens √≠ntimas Monique Faria ‚Äì [Compartilhar](#ShareIcons) Not√≠cias mais buscadas agora. Saiba mais Nova medida adotada! O Instagram, da empresa Meta, anunciou nesta quinta-feira (17), lan√ßamento de uma campanha contra o vazamento de fotos √≠ntimas, enviadas na rede social. A campanha veio acompanhada de uma nova medida da plataforma: o bloqueio de capturas de telas para imagens enviadas pelo chat. Dessa forma, a Meta se compromete na luta contra a sextors√£o, que consiste em chantagem com amea√ßa de divulga√ß√£o das imagens √≠ntimas, os famosos nudes. O recuso ainda est√° em fase de teste, mas entrar√° em vigor em breve. Assim, quem receber uma foto em ‚Äúvisualiza√ß√£o √∫nica‚Äù ou ‚Äúrevis√£o permitida‚Äù, ser√° impossibilitado de fazer uma captura de tele par aguardar as imagens. O grupo tamb√©m desenvolveu o ‚Äúverificador de nudez‚Äù, na rede social. Esse recurso √© ativado automaticamente em contas configuradas como menor de idade. Assim, detecta imagens com nudez enviadas por direct e as desfoca automaticamente. Desde abril deste ano, a empresa implementou uma s√©rie de medidas que controlam as contas dos adolescentes na plataforma, a fim de garantir mais seguran√ßa √† esses usu√°rios. üí¨ Receba not√≠cias antes de todo mundo Seja o primeiro a saber de tudo o que acontece nas cidades de Mato Grosso do Sul. S√£o not√≠cias em tempo real com informa√ß√µes detalhadas dos casos policiais, tempo em MS, tr√¢nsito, vagas de emprego e concursos, direitos do consumidor. Al√©m disso, voc√™ fica por dentro das √∫ltimas novidades sobre pol√≠tica, transpar√™ncia e esc√¢ndalos. üì¢ Participe da nossa comunidade no WhatsApp e acompanhe a cobertura jornal√≠stica mais completa e mais r√°pida de Mato Grosso do Sul. Not√≠cias mais lidas agora Sobrinho coloca fogo em est√¢ncia e tenta matar queimados marido e mulher em Campo Grande Detento ‚Äòperde a cabe√ßa‚Äô, arranca c√¢mera da Gameleira e amea√ßa quebra-quebra na cadeia Homem √© espancado a pauladas at√© a morte por sobrinho e corpo encontrado em casa em MS Fam√≠lia teria raspado cabe√ßa em solidariedade √† mulher que aplicou golpe fingindo c√¢ncer em Campo Grande √öltimas Not√≠cias Com prazo quase fim, dirigentes do interior e Petrallas devem concorrer a cargo de Cez√°rio Elei√ß√µes acontecem no dia 1¬∫ de novembro e novo presidente fica at√© 2027 TRE-MS multa em R$ 20 mil candidato por derrame de santinhos em Campo Grande Candidato alcan√ßou supl√™ncia para C√¢mara de Campo Grande Motociclista morre ap√≥s bater em coqueiro na BR-376 em Vicentina Maicon teria sa√≠do da casa da namorada em F√°tima do Sul na madrugada e retornava para a resid√™ncia da m√£e Inc√™ndios j√° consumiram mais de 1,5 milh√µes de hectares do Pantanal de MS O n√∫mero corresponde a 1.567,7% a mais que os danos do ano passado Newsletter Inscreva-se e receba em primeira m√£o os principais conte√∫dos do Brasil e do mundo.

author: time news
title: Euro 2024 handball: the French team dominates Iceland and approaches the semi-finals
text:
2024-01-20 18:56:12
They dominated, never trailed, but only took off at the very end of the game. Here is the paradox cultivated by the players of the France team against Iceland. The fault of a chronic lack of efficiency in front of the opposing goal in the first period, the Blues were closely followed by the Icelanders. They finally secured victory at the end of the game, with a seven-point lead thanks to a final goal from Nicolas Tournat (60th, 39-32).
Earlier in the game, the French thought about taking off (22-16 in the 36th minute). But they conceded three consecutive goals in less than two minutes (22-19, 37th). The entire match was played at this pace: the Blues increased their lead, then conceded the points won in the process. ‚ÄúWe had a lot of situations to play. But the efficiency can still be improved,‚Äù confirmed the coach, Guillaume Gille, at the end of the meeting.
In the game, French players showed great superiority. They affirmed it from the start of the game, through Ludovic Fabregas on the momentum of his previous matches. Like an oak tree in the middle of the opposing 9 meters, he was unmissable and scored three goals in eight minutes (5-4). This subsequently attracted the Icelanders onto him and opened up space at the back.
‚ÄúWe performed well in all areas of the game‚Äù
An analysis shared by Dika Mem after the match: ‚ÄúIceland defends hard but is quite wide. The pivots did a big job inside. ¬ª The right-back also hopes that this part will be ‚Äúthe basis of the France team for the matches to come‚Äù.
After seven minutes without scoring in the first period, the Nordiques had nevertheless re-mobilized (15th, 8-5) and took advantage of the French team‚Äôs missed face-to-face encounters. Like Hugo Descat (2/4 shooting), the wingers often poorly exploited their counter-attacks. The second half was an offensive festival. France was sharper and ended up taking off.
‚ÄúWe played a complete match, both in attack and defense,‚Äù confided Luka Karabatic. We performed well in all areas of the game,‚Äù said the captain. Still leader of its group and undefeated in this Euro, Guillaume Gille‚Äôs team continues its road towards the title it so desires. Their qualification for the semi-finals could even be assured on Saturday evening, depending on the results of the other matches in the group.
#Euro #handball #French #team #dominates #Iceland #approaches #semifinals
